Name: ZombieHunt
About the game: GamePlay: Hunt and kill as much zombies as you can. How long can you stay alive? Features: • Energy: Kill zombies to gain energy. Lose to much and game over. • Guns: Find them around town, your need lots of guns! • KillCount: Keeps track of all the zombies killed. • Horror: A town filled with zombies! • HardCore: No save/load, no health bar. • Zombies: Zombies can only be killed temporarily.
